description.S:
In this 20-minute lightning talk, I will share practical, actionable advice on securing a Flutter app to meet enterprise-level standards. Drawing from our experience developing a finance app for 3 million people at Mastercard, this session will consider essential security practices you can implement right away. Unlike theoretical discussions, this talk will focus on real-world examples and code snippets, ensuring you walk away with clear steps to enhance your appâ€™s security. 

 After this talk, you will know there is a more secure way to store data on the device than using the flutter_secure_storage package, how to secure communication with servers, and many other practices.

title.S: Securing Your Flutter App to Enterprise Standards
